name: Header verification Collection Details
description:
This request has a test asserting that certain response headers are present or have an expected value.

You can access details of the response, such as headers, on the `pm.response` object. See the [response object documentation](https://learning.postman.com/docs/writing-scripts/script-references/postman-sandbox-api-reference/#scripting-with-response-data) for other properties available.
